trans-unit.source: Provides a visual editor for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager" /> fields.
trans-unit.target: Stellt einen visuellen Editor für <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager" />-Felder bereit.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor> class provides a visual editor that is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor> Klasse bietet einen visuellen Editor, der intern von verwendet wird die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> festzulegenden Steuerelements die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A> Eigenschaft.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor" /> class.
Context information about the design environment.
A reference to the associated designer.
trans-unit.target: Ein Verweis auf den zugeordneten Designer.

trans-unit.source: Displays the visual editor by using the style that is indicated by the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.GetEditStyle" /> method to update the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Zeigt den visuellen Editor mithilfe des Stils an, der von der <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.GetEditStyle" />-Methode zum Aktualisieren der <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields" />-Eigenschaft angegeben wird.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object.
Context information about the design environment.
Gets the style that the editor will use.
trans-unit.target: Ruft den Stil ab, der vom Editor verwendet wird.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the type of style that the editor will use.
trans-unit.target: Einer der Enumerationswerte, der den vom Editor verwendeten Stiltyp angibt.

trans-unit.source: This method indicates the editor style that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method and will always return `UITypeEditorEditStyle.Modal`.
trans-unit.target: Diese Methode gibt die Editor-Stil, die von verwendet wird, an die <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.EditValue%2A> -Methode und wird stets `UITypeEditorEditStyle.Modal`.
